docs.snippet: Saudi Arabia's sweeping plans to overhaul its economy in coming years are matched by proposals for social transformation that extend to ways of tackling domestic violence, increasing city park space and reducing road deaths....
docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia's sweeping plans to overhaul its economy in coming years are matched by proposals for social transformation that extend to ways of tackling domestic violence, increasing city park space and reducing road deaths.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Aims for Social Overhaul in Reform Plan
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Aims for Social Overhaul in Reform Plan

docs.snippet: In the shadows of Kuala Lumpur's gleaming high-rises, a non-governmental organization has started holding workshops on sexual abuse for children of a poor Indian community, once a haunt of convicted British paedophile Richard Huckle....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the shadows of Kuala Lumpur's gleaming high-rises, a non-governmental organization has started holding workshops on sexual abuse for children of a poor Indian community, once a haunt of convicted British paedophile Richard Huckle.

headline.main: British Paedophile Exploited Stigma of Abuse in Vulnerable Communities
headline.print_headline: British Paedophile Exploited Stigma of Abuse in Vulnerable Communities

docs.snippet: The 1996 U.S. women's basketball team keeps impacting the  game at all levels — sparking the launch of two professional leagues and inspiring players at the college and high school levels. Here's a look at the players on the gold-medal winni...
docs.lead_paragraph: The 1996 U.S. women's basketball team keeps impacting the  game at all levels — sparking the launch of two professional leagues and inspiring players at the college and high school levels. Here's a look at the players on the gold-medal winning team, their contributions and where they are now:

headline.main: 1996 Team Impact: Big Olympic Moments, Where Are They Now?
headline.print_headline: 1996 Team Impact: Big Olympic Moments, Where Are They Now?
